VideoColorSpace.summary: The VideoColorSpace interface of the represents the color space of a video.

VideoColorSpaceFullRange.summary: The fullRange read-only property of the interface returns true if full-range color values are used.
VideoColorSpaceFullRange.value: A , true if full-range color values are used.

VideoColorSpaceMatrix.summary: The matrix read-only property of the interface returns the matrix coefficient of the video. Matrix coefficients describe the relationship between sample component values and color coordinates.
VideoColorSpaceMatrix.value: A string containing one of the following values:

VideoColorSpacePrimaries.summary: The primaries read-only property of the interface returns the color {{glossary("gamut")}} of the video.
VideoColorSpacePrimaries.value: A string containing one of the following values:

VideoColorSpaceTransfer.summary: The transfer read-only property of the interface returns the opto-electronic transfer characteristics of the video.
VideoColorSpaceTransfer.value: A string containing one of the following values:

VideoColorSpaceVideoColorSpace.summary: The VideoColorSpace() constructor creates a new object which represents a video color space.

VideoColorSpaceToJSON.summary: The toJSON() method of the interface is a serializer that returns a JSON representation of the VideoColorSpace object.
